named-query.name: findRoleByUserAccount
named-query.query: select role from RoleUserAuthorization rau join rau.role role join rau.user user where user.userAccount=:userAccount and rau.abolishDate>:abolishDate

named-query.name: isRoleExist
named-query.query: select role from Role role where role.name=:name and role.abolishDate>:abolishDate

named-query.name: findRoleByName
named-query.query: select role from Role role where role.name=:name and role.abolishDate>:abolishDate

named-query.name: findAllRoles
named-query.query: select role from Role role where role.abolishDate>:abolishDate

named-query.name: findAllRoleIds
named-query.query: select role.id from Role role where role.abolishDate>:abolishDate

named-query.name: findRoleIdsByUserAccount
named-query.query: select rau.role.id from RoleUserAuthorization rau where rau.user.userAccount=:userAccount and rau.abolishDate>:abolishDate
